response.job_title: MD, PhD, Clinical Geneticist and Genomic Medicine
response.summary: Clinical expertise in the recognition, diagnosis, and genetic counselling of patients and families affected of genetic diseases (including dysmorphology, prenatal diagnosis, cardiac genetics, neurogenetics and cancer predisposition syndromes). Promoting clinical prevention, early detection and to help in some cases with management decisions.
response.skills: Molecular Biology, Research, Cell Biology, Cell Culture, Genetics, Cancer, Medicine, Hospitals, Treatment, DNA extraction, qPCR, Chronic Illness, Immunoblotting, DNA sequencing, MLPA assay, Cytogenetics, Biology, Haplotype analysis, STR markers, Transgenic Mice

profile_positions.description:
Medical Geneticist and Genomic medicine.
Prenatal diagnosis, practice of dysmorphology, clinical genetics and genomics, interpretation of genetic test results, and genetic counselling.
A multidisciplinary team approach: I am working on genomic information management to guide clinical diagnostic, prognosis, risk assessement, and treatment decisions.
profile_positions.title: Physician, Unidad de Genética clínica

profile_positions.description: Cancer genetics risk assessment in cancer predisposition syndromes (personal and family history of cancer), interpretation of genetic test results, predictive genetic testing and genetic screening for family members. Clinical reports and genetic counseling in cancer predisposition syndromes.
profile_positions.title: Clinical director in CancerHIC

profile_positions.description: Clinical expert in molecular diagnosis of inherited diseases, genetic testing (Next-Generation and Sanger Sequencing, MLPA, and SNP-array), clinical-molecular reports, clinical genetics and genetic counseling.
profile_positions.title: Medical Geneticist

school.name: Universidad del País Vasco/Euskal Herriko Unibertsitatea

education.degree_name: Master on Clinical Oncology and Cancer biology

education.grade: Curso SEOM online en Cáncer Hereditario VI Ed.

education.degree_name: Bachelor of Medicine, Bachelor of Surgery - MBBS

company.name: Parc Taulí Hospital Universitari
company.description:
El Consorci Corporació Sanitària Parc Taulí de Sabadell és una entitat jurídica pública de caràcter institucional. 

El Consorci és hospital universitari de la Universitat Autònoma de Barcelona i amb una Unitat Docent. 

El Consorci està vinculat a la Fundació Parc Taulí, que té la consideració d'institut universitari també adscrit a la Universitat Autònoma de Barcelona.

L'objectiu del Consorci és la realització d'activitats sanitàries, sociosanitàries i socials al servei dels ciutadans, així com docents, d'investigació i innovació sanitària.
